original_title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Live Concert
overview: Experience the award winning music of The Witcher III: Wild Hunt and both its expansions, Hearts of Stone & Blood Wine, in a never before seen way, performed live during Film Music Festival 2016 in Kraków, Poland.  Video Game Show — The Witcher III: Wild Hunt concert was organized by CD PROJEKT RED in cooperation with Kraków Festival Office.
title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Live Concert
